1169500.name: The Valley
1169500.description:
The Valley is a single player FPS PC game that takes place in a spider infested valley. Collect weapons and ammunition to survive the never ending waves of spiders.

STATUS

The Valley is currently playable in early access but needs many more features to be truly enjoyable.

CURRENT FEATURES

  • Four weapons and ammunition hidden throughout the valley.
  • Ability to respawn after death to regroup and survive longer.
  • Endless waves of spiders with increasing difficulties.
  • Boss fight every 3 waves.

FUTURE WORKS

  • More weapons and ammunition to choose from.
  • Different types for spiders with different abilities (ie. spitting poison)
  • Health packs and buffs.
  • Slow time feature.
  • Achievements.
  • Time of day change, with night only options.

FAR FUTURE WORKS

  • More levels
  • Weapon attachments
  • Level up weapons
1169500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
